block.p: Suzanne Marie Reitano, the daughter of Virginia and Arthur Reitano of Pawleys Island, S.C., was married yesterday to Mark Andrew Burchill, a son of Cathryn Burchill and Thomas F. Burchill II, both of New York. The Rev. Peter M. Colapietro performed the ceremony at St. Andrew's Roman Catholic Church on Block Island in Rhode Island.

Mrs. Burchill, 33, was until recently an account executive at Clifford Public Relations in New York. She graduated from the University of Iowa. Her parents are retired. Her father was a property director for Allstate Insurance in Northbrook, Ill., and her mother was a librarian at the Cary Public Library in Cary, Ill.

Suzanne Marie Reitano, the daughter of Virginia and Arthur Reitano of Pawleys Island, S.C., was married yesterday to Mark Andrew Burchill, a son of Cathryn Burchill and Thomas F. Burchill II, both of New York. The Rev. Peter M. Colapietro performed the ceremony at St. Andrew's Roman Catholic Church on Block Island in Rhode Island.

Mrs. Burchill, 33, was until recently an account executive at Clifford Public Relations in New York. She graduated from the University of Iowa. Her parents are retired. Her father was a property director for Allstate Insurance in Northbrook, Ill., and her mother was a librarian at the Cary Public Library in Cary, Ill.

Mr. Burchill, also 33, was until earlier this year a partner and senior vice president for worldwide business at 24/7 Media in New York, an online advertising company, which he helped to found. He is currently a consultant in New York to Internet start-up companies. He graduated from Hobart College and received an M.B.A. degree from the University of California at Los Angeles. His father is the chairman and chief executive of the Petry Media Corporation, television advertising representatives in New York. The bridegroom's mother is an interior designer for the Phillips Group, an architectural firm in New York.
